T_STAT:
The t-stat equals 1.82. It is computed through a t-test and represents 
the significance of the observed differences.
P_VALUE:
Its effect isn't statistically significant, neither at the 95 nor the 90% levels: we cannot reject the
null hypothesis that the feature has no link at all with the target.
INCREASE:
For each percentage point of augmentation of the share of families with a married couple, 
the total number of incidents in the district decreases by 15730 (!!)
LIMITATIONS:
(Please note, it is no Markdown cell) 
The dataset is way too small.
